channel.title: Adding membership--need help
channel.description:
*************BEfore you people call me a lazy git i have used the search button****************
I have added a member portal and a member area but i am having trouble with the "membership" I use the command and i am a member but when i log out and back in i have lost the right.. Can any of you ppl give me the code for a npc which can give membership for a certain amount of money?
I would apricate it if you can help?
